email.incomingsupport.body1.text: Kua tukuna e te kiritaki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei

email.secret_link.subject.text: I tuku a %{sender_email} i tētahi karere huna ki a koe

email.secret_link.sent_you_secret.text: i tuku ki a koe he karere huna:

email.secret_link.link_works_once.text: Kotahi noa te wā e mahi ai tēnei hononga. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmau te karere huna.

email.welcome.subject.text: Nau mai ki %{product_name} - Tēnā manatoko i tō īmēra

email.welcome.verify_prompt.text: Tēnā manatoko i tō wāhitau īmēra mā te pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.text: Rānei tāruatia, ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.welcome.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}. Mēnā kāore koe i waihanga pūkete, ka taea e koe te waiho i tēnei karere.

email.password_request.request_notice.text: Kua riro i a mātou tētahi tono ki te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.text: Rānei tāruatia, ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.text: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i te tautuhi anō kupuhipa, ka taea e koe te waiho i tēnei īmēra.

email.password_request.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.text: I tono koe i tētahi hononga takiuru mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.text: Rānei tāruatia, ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.text: Ka pau tēnei hononga i roto i ngā meneti 15.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.text: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i tēnei hononga, ka taea e koe te waiho i tēnei īmēra.

email.magic_link.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.subject.text: Kua riro i a koe he karere huna

email.incoming_secret.received_message.text: Kua riro i a koe he karere haumaru:

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.text: Kua tukuna e tētahi he karere haumaru ki a koe mā %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.text: Ki te tiro i tēnei karere huna, pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.text: Kotahi noa te wā e mahi ai tēnei hononga. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmau te karere huna.

email.secret_revealed.viewed_on.text: I tirohia tō karere huna i te %{date}.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.text: He whakamōhiotanga aunoa tēnei. Kāore he mahi e hiahiatia ana.

email.secret_revealed.manage_preferences.text: Ki te whakahaere i ō manakohanga whakamōhiotanga:

email.expiration_warning.subject.text: Ka pau tata tō hononga huna

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.text: Ka pau tō hononga huna i roto i %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.text: Tirohia tō karere huna i mua i te paunga

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.text: Whai muri i te paunga, ka mukua pūmau te karere huna, kāore e taea te whakahoki.

email.expiration_warning.view_before_gon.text: Tirohia i mua i te ngaro:

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.text: Whai muri i te paunga, ka mukua pūmau te karere huna.

email.organization_invitation.subject.text: Kua pōhiritia koe ki te hono atu ki %{organization_name}

email.organization_invitation.title.text: Kua pōhiritia koe ki te hono atu ki %{organization_name}!

email.organization_invitation.body.text: Kua pōhiri a %{inviter_email} i a koe ki te hono atu ki "%{organization_name}" hei %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.text: Rānei tāruatia, ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.text: Ka pau tēnei pōhiri i roto i ngā rā %{days}.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.text: Mēnā kāore koe e hiahia ki te hono atu, ka taea e koe te waiho i tēnei īmēra, te whakakāhore rānei i te pōhiri.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{invited_email}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako ki tēnei pōhiri, ka taea e koe te waiho i tēnei karere.

email.password_changed.body.text: Kua hurihia tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name} i te %{date} i te %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.text: Mēnā ehara i a koe i huri i tēnei, tēnā haumarutia tō pūkete ināianei tonu mā te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa me te whakapā atu ki te tautoko.

email.email_changed.body.text: Kua hurihia te wāhitau īmēra mō tō pūkete %{product_name} ki %{new_email_masked} i te %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.text: Mēnā ehara i a koe i huri i tēnei, tēnā whakapā tere ki te tautoko nā te mea tērā pea kua whakaekea tō pūkete.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.text: Tēnā manatoko i tēnei wāhitau īmēra hei whakaoti i te huringa mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.text: Rānei tāruatia, ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.mfa_enabled.body.text: Kua whakahohea te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i te %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.text: Kua haumaru ake tō pūkete ināianei. Me whakauru koe i tētahi waehere manatoko mai i tō taupānga manatoko i te wā e takiuru ana.

email.mfa_disabled.body.text: Kua monokia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i te %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.text: Kua iti iho te haumaru o tō pūkete ināianei. Mēnā ehara i a koe i huri i tēnei, tēnā haumarutia tō pūkete ināianei tonu.

email.new_login_alert.body.text: Kua kitea he takiuru hou ki tō pūkete %{product_name} i te %{date} i te %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.text: Mēnā ehara tēnei i a koe, tērā pea kua whakaekea tō pūkete.

email.member_removed.body.text: Kua tangohia koe mai i te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i runga i %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.text: Kua hurihia tō tūranga i "%{organization_name}" mai i %{old_role} ki %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.text: Kua mukua te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" mai i %{product_name}. Kua tangohia ngā raraunga katoa e pā ana.

email.payment_receipt.body.text: Ngā mihi mō tō utu. Anei ngā taipitopito utu:

email.payment_failed.body.text: Kāore i taea e mātou te tukatuka tō utu mō %{product_name}. Tēnā whakahōu tō tikanga utu kia karo i te whakatarunga ratonga.

email.trial_expiring.subject.text: Ka pau tō whakamātautau %{product_name} i roto i ngā rā %{days_remaining}

email.trial_expiring.body.text: Ka pau tō whakamātautau utukore o %{product_name} i roto i ngā rā %{days_remaining}. Whakapikia ināianei kia pupuri i te uru ki ngā āhuatanga katoa.

email.subscription_changed.body.text: Kua hurihia tō ohaurunga %{product_name} mai i %{old_plan} ki %{new_plan}.

email.subscription_changed.effective_dat.text: Ka mahi tēnei huringa mai i te %{date}.
